unnormalised: **New Wheels Alert: The Indian Automotive Scene is Buzzing!**
normalised: New Wheels Alert: The Indian Automotive Scene is Buzzing!

unnormalised: Oi, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, because the Indian automotive sector is on a roll! Dr. Reddy's Motors just launched the "Vijay Rath," a rugged SUV perfect for those crazy Bangalore roads. Initial reviews are saying it handles like a dream, even on those pothole-ridden stretches near Silk Board.
normalised: Oi, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, because the Indian automotive sector is on a roll! Doctor Reddy's Motors just launched the "Vijay Rath," a rugged S U V perfect for those crazy Bangalore roads. Initial reviews are saying it handles like a dream, even on those pothole-ridden stretches near Silk Board.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Tata Motors unveiled the "Nandi," a compact hatchback aimed at the budget-conscious buyer. Starting at just Rs. 4.5 Lakhs, it's got everyone talking. Rumour has it that the Nandi comes with a spacious interior of 250 sq ft!
normalised: Not to be left behind, Tata Motors unveiled the "Nandi," a compact hatchback aimed at the budget-conscious buyer. Starting at just rupee four point five lakhs, it's got everyone talking. Rumour has it that the Nandi comes with a spacious interior of two hundred and fifty square feet!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra is teasing a new electric scooter, codenamed "Project Bijli," promising a whopping 200 km range on a single charge. This could be a game-changer for the EV market in India, especially with rising fuel prices. Seems like Diwali will come early this year for auto aficionados! Keep your eyes peeled for more updates!
